# utils-flatten

Flattens an array.

## Install

    $ npm install utils-flatten

## Usage

```javascript
var arr = ['one', ['two', ['three', 'four'], 'five']];

flatten(arr);
// => ['one', 'two', 'three', 'four', 'five']
```

## Tests

    $ npm install
    $ npm test

[![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/jaredhanson/utils-flatten.png)](http://travis-ci.org/jaredhanson/utils-flatten)
